# Builder Agent

> This is a reference file for GitHub's agent system.
> The authoritative version is maintained at `.ai/agents/builder.md`

## Quick Reference

**Role:** Technical implementation - features, bugs, tests, code review

**Authority Level:** See `.ai/decision-boundaries.md`

## Full Documentation

For complete builder agent documentation, see:
- **Primary source:** [.ai/agents/builder.md](../../.ai/agents/builder.md)
- **Decision boundaries:** [.ai/decision-boundaries.md](../../.ai/decision-boundaries.md)
- **Standards:** `.ai/standards/code/`

## Usage

When working on technical implementation tasks:

```
Read .ai/agents/builder.md and implement [feature/fix/test]
```

---

**Note:** This file exists for GitHub agent system compatibility. All updates should be made to `.ai/agents/builder.md` which is the single source of truth.
